[This](https://echarts.apache.org/en/builder.html) is a tool to build with the components you need.
We are considering doing a more aggressive bundle size reduction job with v5.0, but for now, the builder tool is all you can do.

We at [Check Point Software](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Check_Point) (@checkpointsw) and @Intezer were happy to use it to visualize [our research](https://research.checkpoint.com/russianaptecosystem/).

The visualization can be found here  https://apt-ecosystem.com/russia/map/ and it is publicly available as open-source [on GitHub](https://github.com/ITAYC0HEN/APT-Ecosystem).

`em` is not supported currently. There is a PR to support `rem`. @100pah @pissang Please help review that PR when you have time.
@FuckAName Could you consider using `px` instead of `em`?
Seems to be a bug.

There have been several similar requirements. I think we should support this, along with aligning labels on the left side and right side. This can also help solve the problem of text being outside of the Canvas.

我在IOS 13上也遇到了这个问题，tooltip弹出无法覆盖图表，反而被图表覆盖了。IOS < 13是正常的。
Echarts 版本： 4
客户端： ionic 混合APP
手机：iphone X 
手机系统版本：IOS 13

It's not a bug. Interval works differently between `category` axis and `value` axis. In your case it's `value` axis. The interval means the difference between two ticks and it should always be larger than 0
SVG map support has been removed since v3.0. But it will be back soon!
You can use two pie series to simulate it

@pissang Thanks for your explanation. My usecase can be solved by setting `xAxis.type` to be `'category'` explicitly. 

However `axisLabel.interval` on `value` axis still doesn't take effect when set a value larger than 0.
This is a frequently requested feature. We should probably support this in v5.0.
我在使用中发现一个新问题，发现同一个节点不能被多次target，请问这个现在有解决办法没？
pull request可以的。

我现在也有这个问题，我不仅要区分为null和0的区别，还要在折线图展示出来，就是x:1, y:null
x:2, y:0这样的展示请问有办法吗，
如果我的需求是target、source、category只要一个不同就认为是一组需要打印的关系，这个好像echarts还没支持
当前我测试出也是target不能出现一样的，即每个节点只能被做为target一次。

现在用px规避问题了，如果浏览器兼容性有差异，建议配置项手册进行说明
